body.bibl: Keser-Kayaalp, Elif. “The Great Mosque of Diyarbakır in Light of Discussions on Spolia and Classicism.” In Spolia Reincarnated: Afterlives of Objects, Materials, and Spaces in Anatolia from Antiquity to the Ottoman Era, edited by Ivana Jevtić and Suzan Yalman, 125–47. Istanbul: Koç University Research Center for Anatolian Civilizations, 2018.

Elif Keser-Kayaalp, The Great Mosque of Diyarbakır in Light of Discussions on Spolia and Classicism,” in Spolia Reincarnated: Afterlives of Objects, Materials, and Spaces in Anatolia from Antiquity to the Ottoman Era, ed. Ivana Jevtić and Suzan Yalman (Istanbul: Koç University Research Center for Anatolian Civilizations, 2018), 125–47.
